Class GameGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas

    public class GameGUI
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This contains the main game loop

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the game loop

        This includes creating the pixel array to use, creating the main GUI thread, creating the JFrame, two Player objects, and starting the main GUI thread.
